name: Meet Hayk
description: Set out on a journey and find Hayk.

objective.name: Go to the Shrine.
objective.description: Go to the Shrine in Ararat Valley Village and find Vazgen.

objective.name: Talk with Vazgen.
objective.description: Talk with Vazgen. He is waiting at the Shrine in Ararat Valley Village.

objective.name: Go to the Ararat Valley Village gates.
objective.description: Find the old man Arsen and talk to him. He is waiting at the village gates.

objective.name: Talk with the old man Arsen.
objective.description: Find the old man Arsen and talk to him. He is waiting at the village gates.
